Social media users sharing images of Ind: Adani Gas (IOAG) refuelling station and implying that Indian Oil Corporation has been sold to the Adani Group under the BJP regime.
Congress members: including Indian Youth Congress national president Srinivas B V, sharing the claim on Twitter, gaining significant retweets.
The website of IndianOil: Adani Gas Pvt. Ltd. stating that IOAG is a joint venture between Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IOC) and Adani Gas Ltd., which was formed in 2013 during the Congress-led government's tenure.
